  • Method Details

    • removeDisconnectedClient

      public void removeDisconnectedClient(Client client)
      Removes a disconnected client from the server.
      Parameters:
      client - The client to be removed

    • setLastSurvivingWinner

      public void setLastSurvivingWinner(String lastClient)
      It sets a timer, lasting Lobby.seconds, after which the last online player is declared the winner of the game. This method is called when only one player remains in the game.
      Parameters:
      lastClient - remaining the game

    • setNickname

      public void setNickname(String nickname, Client client) throws LobbyException
      The method assigns a nickname to a client, while checking if the nickname is already in use, and adds the client to an existing lobby, if Lobby.numPlayer has been defined.
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the joining player
      client - to which assign the nickname above
      Throws:
      LobbyException - in case the number of player is still not known

    • setNumPlayer

      public void setNumPlayer(int numPlayer) throws LobbyException
      Sets the number of players in the lobby. Only the first player in the lobby can set the number of players.
      Parameters:
      numPlayer - The number of players to set.
      Throws:
      LobbyException - If the number of players is invalid or the player is not the first player in the lobby.

    • updateController

      public void updateController(Client client, List<Coordinates> coordinatesList, int column) throws LobbyException, PickTilesException, NotEnoughCellsException
      Updates the game controller with the player's actions.
      Parameters:
      client - The client making the move.
      coordinatesList - The list of coordinates chosen by the player.
      column - The column chosen by the player.
      Throws:
      LobbyException - If the client is not present in the lobby.
      PickTilesException - If there is an error in picking the tiles.
      NotEnoughCellsException - If there are not enough cells available for the move.

    • getInstance

      public static Lobby getInstance()
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of the Lobby.

    • getState

      public it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.Lobby.State getState()
      Returns:
      current Lobby state

    • loadLobbyFromUpdates

      public void loadLobbyFromUpdates(Map<Integer,GameUpdateToFile> updates)
      Loads the lobby state from a map of game updates.
      Parameters:
      updates -

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(Client client, @Nullable String to, String message) throws LobbyException
      Sends a message from a client to another client or to the entire chat.
      Parameters:
      client - The client sending the message.
      to - The nickname of the recipient client. If null, the message is sent to the entire chat.
      message - The content of the message.
      Throws:
      LobbyException - if the game has ended and messages cannot be sent.
